meta.name: Balodabazar
meta.description: Balodabazar is known for temples, forests, and cultural heritage of Chhattisgarh.

temples.name: Bhand Dewal Temple
temples.description: Ancient Shiva temple known for architecture.

temples.name: Shivrinarayan Temple
temples.description: Major pilgrimage site at Mahanadi–Jonk confluence.

wildlife.name: Barnawapara Wildlife Sanctuary
wildlife.description: Famous wildlife sanctuary known for deer, leopards, and birds.

hill-stations.name: Champaran Viewpoint
hill-stations.description: Small natural elevated area offering scenic views.

markets.name: Balodabazar Main Market
markets.description: Local daily market for vegetables and household goods.

markets.name: Shivrinarayan Local Bazaar
markets.description: Temple town market known for sweets and religious items.

meta.name: Raipur
meta.description: Raipur, the capital of Chhattisgarh, is known for its temples, lakes, vibrant markets, and cultural landmarks.

temples.name: Dudhadhari Math
temples.description: Ancient temple and monastery dedicated to Lord Rama.

temples.name: Hatkeshwar Mahadev Temple
temples.description: Popular Shiva temple visited by devotees throughout the year.

temples.name: Mahant Ghasidas Memorial
temples.description: Important cultural and historical landmark of Raipur.

wildlife.name: Nandan Van Jungle Safari
wildlife.description: Wildlife safari and zoo showcasing rich biodiversity.

markets.name: Gol Bazaar
markets.description: One of the oldest and busiest markets in Raipur.

markets.name: Pandri Market
markets.description: Famous shopping area known for clothes and accessories.

meta.name: Durg–Bhilai
meta.description: Durg–Bhilai twin cities are known for temples, steel industry, dams, markets, and leisure parks of Chhattisgarh.

temples.name: Devrani–Jethani Temple
temples.description: Ancient temple famous for its unique architecture.

temples.name: Uwasaggaharam Parshwa Teerth
temples.description: Well-known Jain pilgrimage site in Durg.

temples.name: Shiv Mandir Sector 6
temples.description: Popular Shiva temple located in Bhilai township.

dams.name: Tandula Dam
dams.description: Major irrigation dam near Durg with scenic surroundings.

dams.name: Kharkhara Reservoir
dams.description: Reservoir and picnic spot near Durg.

markets.name: Power House Market
markets.description: Busy shopping area in Bhilai for clothes and food.

wildlife.name: Maitri Bagh Zoo
wildlife.description: Zoo and recreational park with musical fountain.

meta.name: Jagdalpur (Bastar)
meta.description: Jagdalpur is the tourism capital of Bastar, famous for waterfalls, tribal culture, caves, and forests.

temples.name: Danteshwari Temple
temples.description: One of the 52 Shakti Peethas, major religious site of Bastar.

waterfalls.name: Chitrakote Waterfall
waterfalls.description: Known as the Niagara of India, widest waterfall in India.

waterfalls.name: Tirathgarh Waterfall
waterfalls.description: Beautiful multi-level waterfall inside Kanger Valley.

wildlife.name: Kanger Valley National Park
wildlife.description: Dense forest, caves, wildlife and biodiversity hotspot.

markets.name: Jagdalpur Main Market
markets.description: Local tribal handicrafts and Bastar art market.

meta.name: Korba
meta.description: Korba is known for Hasdeo river, dams, forests and natural beauty.

temples.name: Siddh Baba Temple
temples.description: Famous local religious temple near Hasdeo river.

dams.name: Hasdeo Bango Dam
dams.description: One of the largest dams of Chhattisgarh.

markets.name: Korba City Market
markets.description: Main shopping and local goods market.

meta.name: Ambikapur (Surguja)
meta.description: Ambikapur is known for hills, temples, waterfalls and natural landscapes.

waterfalls.name: Tiger Point Waterfall
waterfalls.description: Scenic waterfall surrounded by forest hills.

meta.name: Raigarh
meta.description: Raigarh is known for temples, rivers and cultural heritage.

meta.name: Dhamtari
meta.description: Dhamtari is known for dams, forests and waterfalls.

dams.name: Gangrel Dam
dams.description: Major dam and picnic spot near Dhamtari.

meta.name: Kawardha (Kabirdham)
meta.description: Kawardha is known for Bhoramdeo Temple, forests, and heritage sites.

temples.name: Bhoramdeo Temple
temples.description: Ancient temple known as Khajuraho of Chhattisgarh.

temples.name: Madwa Mahal
temples.description: Historical temple structure near Bhoramdeo complex.

wildlife.name: Kawardha Forest Area
wildlife.description: Dense forest region with wildlife and trekking trails.

markets.name: Kawardha Main Market
markets.description: Local shopping market with tribal products.

meta.name: Kanker
meta.description: Kanker is known for waterfalls, tribal culture, and forests.

waterfalls.name: Malanjkudum Waterfall
waterfalls.description: Beautiful waterfall surrounded by dense forest.

temples.name: Shiv Temple Kanker
temples.description: Popular local temple in Kanker town.

markets.name: Kanker Local Market
markets.description: Local tribal and daily goods market.

meta.name: Jashpur
meta.description: Jashpur is known for waterfalls, hills, and scenic natural beauty.

waterfalls.name: Rajpuri Waterfall
waterfalls.description: Major tourist waterfall of Jashpur region.

markets.name: Jashpur Market
markets.description: Local agricultural and daily goods market.

meta.name: Bijapur
meta.description: Bijapur is known for forest landscapes and tribal culture.

wildlife.name: Indravati National Park Region
wildlife.description: Dense forest region with rich biodiversity.

markets.name: Bijapur Market
markets.description: Local trading and tribal goods market.

meta.name: Mahasamund
meta.description: Mahasamund is known for temples, forest areas and rural tourism.

temples.name: Chandi Temple Bagbahara
temples.description: Ancient temple dedicated to Goddess Chandi.
